docs.snippet: Kansas City Royals infielder Miguel Tejada, a former-American League Most Valuable Player, has received 105-game suspension for a failed drugs test, Major League Baseball said on Saturday as the sport continued to be plagued by it's doping problem...
docs.lead_paragraph: Kansas City Royals infielder Miguel Tejada, a former-American League Most Valuable Player, has received 105-game suspension for a failed drugs test, Major League Baseball said on Saturday as the sport continued to be plagued by it's doping problem.

docs.snippet: Luke Bryan is a country singer who sounds like anything but one, and his success mirrors country’s full-fledged arrival as an urban and suburban phenomenon....
docs.lead_paragraph: Luke Bryan is a country singer who sounds like anything but one, and his success mirrors country’s full-fledged arrival as an urban and suburban phenomenon.
docs.abstract: Jon Caramanica holds that singer Luke Bryan is at forefront of country music's shift from rural to urban and suburban themes.

headline.main: Luke Bryan, the Leading Gentleman of Country

docs.snippet: A hobbled Miguel Cabrera hit a tiebreaking solo homer in the ninth inning, lifting the Detroit Tigers to a 6-5 win over Kansas City on Saturday night, hours after Royals infielder Miguel Tejada was suspended for at least the rest of this season fo...
docs.lead_paragraph: A hobbled Miguel Cabrera hit a tiebreaking solo homer in the ninth inning, lifting the Detroit Tigers to a 6-5 win over Kansas City on Saturday night, hours after Royals infielder Miguel Tejada was suspended for at least the rest of this season for testing positive for an amphetamine.

headline.main: Cabrera HR Lifts Tigers to 6-5 Win Over Royals
headline.print_headline: Cabrera HR Lifts Tigers to 6-5 Win Over Royals

docs.snippet: Yoenis Cespedes hit a two-run homer in the first, Eric Sogard put Oakland ahead on a seventh-inning double and the Athletics beat the Cleveland Indians 3-2 on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes hit a two-run homer in the first, Eric Sogard put Oakland ahead on a seventh-inning double and the Athletics beat the Cleveland Indians 3-2 on Friday night.

headline.main: A's Hold On for 1st Win Over Indians in 5 Tries
headline.print_headline: A's Hold On for 1st Win Over Indians in 5 Tries
